description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7oe78","text":"This protocol describes immunohistochemical and immunoctyochemical methods to analyze protein expression in mouse brain. In the protocol, we describe the fixation of tissue or cultured neurons, the immunostaining procedure, and collecting images for analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"esuim","text":"Collection of fixed tissues slices from juvenile or adult mice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11dnk","text":"Using a perfusion pump, pierce needle into left ventricle and sever the right atrium; immediately begin perfusing cold 1X PBS followed by 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2bjch","text":"Dissect out brain into 15 mL tube containing cold 4% PFA in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14kvs","text":"Incubate   at   in 4% PFA in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b7ors","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3euas","text":"Incubate   at   in 30% sucrose in PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"B18E002636F611EE9D7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B18E008736F611EE9D7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ca6g","text":"Anesthetize mouse, pin onto dissection tray and open chest cavity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3g0gq","text":"Tissue can be kept in long-term storage at   ; when ready for IHC, slice 35 μm sections using a cryostat (Leica CM3050 S) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"du7uv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1hnhq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3lu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Leica","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"4528913C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.leicabiosystems.com/histology-equipment/cryostats/","name":"Cryostat","sku":"Cryostat","specifications":null,"type":null,"vendor":{"id":416,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.leicabiosystems.com/","name":"Leica Biosystems"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"459rq","text":"Fixation of cultured neurons","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqg4m","text":"Once slices are collected, IHC is performed on either free-floating sections (in cold 1X PBS) or slide-mounted sections","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"52art","text":"Aspirate culture media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cm6jl","text":"Add solution containing 4% PFA and 4% sucrose in 1X PBS to culture dishes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qslv","text":"Incubate for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4tcat","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eprmu","text":"Wash samples three times for 10 minutes at   in 1X PBS on a rocker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8qbuj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ma0d","text":"Aspirate fixing solution and add 1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efl0m","text":"Block and permeabilize for 2 hours at   in 1X PBS containing 4% normal goat serum (NGS) and 0.2% Triton X-100 on a rocker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"22kus","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9np5c","text":"Incubate in primary antibody overnight at    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cah0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cq244","text":"Prepare primary antibody solution by diluting antibody at desired concentration (see step 5.1) in 1X PBS containing 2% NGS and 0.2% Triton X-100 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"408k8","text":"Dilutions for antibodies used in Jain et al., 2023","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p2nm","text":"MAP2 (Chicken) - 1:2000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n2ue","text":"TH (Mouse \u0026 Rabbit) - 1:1000","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi1m6","text":"All other primary antibodies - 1:500","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42ikl","text":"Wash samples three times for 10 minutes at   in 1X PBS on a rocker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"087908D336F911EE9D7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m1nq","text":"Prepare secondary antibody solution by diluting antibody at 1:1000 in 1X PBS containing 2% NGS and 0.2% Triton X-100 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2q880","text":"Incubate in secondary antibody for 1 hour at    in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3sg4g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2C04351036F911EE9D7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ccgn","text":"Wash samples three times for 10 minutes at   in 1X PBS on a rocker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"087908D336F911EE9D7D0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcifo","text":"If using free-floating sections, mount slices onto a slide. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfeqg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jr7i","text":"For all sample types, mount coverslips using   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1etjo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"424ABEFA341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Fluoromount-G","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"0100-01","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.southernbiotech.com/?catno=0100-01\u0026type=Other","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.southernbiotech.com/","name":"Southern Biotech"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fjmg","text":"Collect images of fixed tissue using a microscope:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14uef","text":"For high resolution (e.g. to trace axon sections): Nikon Ti Microscope, equipped with CSU-W1 spinning disk confocal, Plan Apo VC 100x/1.4 oil or 60x/1.4 oil objective and Andor Zyla sCMOS camera","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gvli","text":"For whole brain sections: Nikon 6D conventional wide-field microscope, Plan Apo 20x/0.75 air objective and DS-Qi2 monochrome camera\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vfo6","text":"Store samples at   for short-term storage or   for long-term storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"q6lc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9iu0s","text":"Analyze images using ImageJ Software","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4n6e4","text":"In Jain et al. (2023), measurement of brain slices involved tracing one-pixel lines of dendrites and representative sections of axons. Fluorescence intensity of VMAT2-HA and TH per μm process length from 20 processes was used to determine the mean intensity per field.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5vpu","text":"In Jain et al. (2023), measurement of cultured neurons involved tracing one-pixel lines of dendrites and axons. Mean intensity per µm process length was determined in either three segments of the same axon or in three separate dendrites of the same neuron.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
